meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spotless.
meanings.sent1: The spotlessness of the kitchen floor made it shine brightly.
meanings.sent2: Her white dress showed spotlessness even after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The spotlessness of the cat's fur made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The spotlessness of the snow-covered landscape was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The spotlessness of the room gave it an air of elegance and purity.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or removing spots or stains.
meanings.sent1: She took pride in the spotlessness of her laundry after washing.
meanings.sent2: The spotlessness of the carpet was a result of her meticulous cleaning.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to spotlessness in his car cleaning routine was admirable.
meanings.sent4: The spotlessness of the windows was achieved through diligent scrubbing.
meanings.sent5: The spotlessness of the dishes indicated her attention to detail in cleaning.
